What psukim does shlichus come from?.text: Rashi asked by implication what psukim the Mishnah is getting the idea of slichus from, and answered that the Gemara would address it later.

Why bo and bshlucho?.text: The Gemara asked why the Mishnah had to say he can be
both "bo" and "bshlucho", when if I know he can use a shaliach, I could infer he can do it himself.
